help_step.name: tour_0
help_step.text:
GENERAL INFO

Select Tenants Form

  • This page provides the facility for the user to make a selection of Accounts by using search part of the screen.
  • As a result of the search accounts will be listed.

Exexcute print or email Form

  • Select Activity from activity drop down list.
  • Select the Letter from letter drop down list and update the status for above drop down list.
  • You can also exclude the listed Accounts by using the right side check box.
  • This is very useful for send first letter to account holders with debt balances, or sending Mass email or even sending mass SMS text.
  • Every status and letter changes will be updated for each specified Account. Plus, a record is add in the Notes area reflecting this activity.
